bibl.title: An embalmers’ dispute in Hypsele/Shashotep
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Dublin Inv. TCD Pap. Gr. 310 145.4 P. Count 53; 54
Gert Baetens, An Embalmers' Dispute in Hypsele / Shashotep.
bibl.note: Rifeh (from a cartonnage), 2nd century BC. Prosopographical links with P. Count 53-54 and the Siut archive, and discussion on the term hypoteles and female embalmers.
